channel.title: Zhizheng Liu's homepage
channel.description: Recent content on Zhizheng Liu's homepage

item.title: Readme
item.description:
Hi, my name is Zhizheng Liu (刘知正). I am currently a third-year Ph.D. student in Computer Science at UCLA. Before that, I earned my bachelor’s degree from the SJTU-UM Joint Institute and my master’s degree from ETH Zurich.

Throughout my research journey, I have been fortunate to receive invaluable guidance and support, without which I would not be who I am today. I am especially grateful to Dr. Yikang Li, who first introduced me to research, and to my advisor Prof. Bolei Zhou, whose continuous mentorship has been instrumental in shaping my academic path.
